title: Potion
desc: A potion made with common rue, given to you by the oracle. "Apply this on the petrified characters and they shall be freed from their bronze prison"

title: Sheet music
desc: A piece of paper dropped by Villon. It look like it's sheet music for a carillon

title: Hammer
desc: Hammer given to you by the Carrilonist. Could This hammer be used in construction work?

title: Daffodil
desc: Daffodil given to you by the Builder.

title: Union of Utrecht
desc: A piece of paper which looks like it could be the Union of Utrecht.

title: Quill
desc: A quill given to you by Jan van Nassau.

title: Book
desc: A book given to you by Anna Maria.

title: Sword
desc: A sword given to you by Buys Ballot. Could this be the weapon that can kill the basilisk?

title: Sun
desc: A reflective statue of the sun. Could this be used as a mirror to make the basilisk petrify himself

title: Medallion
desc: You've beaten the basilisk. This medallion represents your victory.
